messages.title: No matter what they try to tell you....
messages.content: ...the race in Brent is between the Lib Dems and Labour

mentions.tacticalSituation: After the General Election, Brent will have either a Liberal Democrat or a Labour MP. No other result is possible. Not voting or voting Conservative here will just help Labour win. Only Lib Dem Sarah Teather can beat Labour here and deliver the change that local people need.

endorsements.endorsement: "The Tories are already out of the race"

quotes.text: The Tories are already out of the race

images.caption: No matter what they try to tell you.... ...the race in Brent is between the Lib Dems and Labour
A local MP who will deliver for you - see over
After the General Election, Brent will have either a Liberal Democrat or a Labour MP. No other result is possible.
How you voted last time in Brent East Only the Lib Dems can beat Gordon Brown's Labour candidate.
